reviews.review_text: Wonderful food and great service.  Very reasonable as well.  I also had to do some computer work and they had super fast reliable wifi. I will be back.

It was a nice experience of eating by the ocean at night... the whole ambience and the decor of the place is so aesthetic... it's lovely to sit there if you want to relax..
The food was 4/5..
We had ordered veg sizzler was was too pricey for the quantity and the taste was also average-the patty was undercooked and tasted of cornflour,the gravy was less and the quantity of rice was not much....3/5

Second dish we ordered was garlic basil and tomato sauce pasta which was 4/5

Third was thai basil fried rice- tasted like normal fried rice tbh... underwhelming

Lastly we ordered paneer Tikka which was a solid 5/5... it was well cooked and there was alot of gravy ...

Highly recommended- wonton soup

I would revisit again!

A truly hidden gem on this beach. Delicious food and drinks, good prices, great and fast service, quiet and peaceful, no salesmen who bothers you, the staff don‚Äôt try to lure you in on arrival, comfortable chairs, fast wifi and a stunning sunset-view. And no one who asks me to leave a review (the curse of India). 10/10 would recommendüôèüèº
